The worker walked out of the building, not quite drunk but not quite not. H=
e walked to a store that sold small shuttles and fell on the counter. He sm=
iles at the owner.

Owner: Well, what can I do for you?

The Worker: Your m=
oney or your life.

Owner: O...O...Okay.

The Worker shoots the Owner in th=
e chest and ran. The Owner watched his leave in confusement. The Worker sta=
rted to giggle. He had so much fun shooting that guy. He went back to the b=
uilding again.

Klaine: Where were you that short amount of time?

Worker: =
What's it to you?

The Worker goes into a storage closet, makes sure nobody=
 can hear, and starts to harm himself. He draws his knife and slashed it ac=
ross his left arm, leaving a large leaking gash. He laughed. He left the cl=
oset 1 hour later, looking pretty slashed up all over.

Ice Trek: Wha?

Wor=
ker: Shut up.

The Worker decided he needed money. He would work any job. H=
e walked down the street and seen some bounties hanging up in several place=
s. He looked at one, a guy with an earthling baseball cap. He laughed and l=
ooked at the rest. A guy named Sarge, a guy named Pillow, a guy named Arrow=
, a guy named Klaine. Klaine? The Worker walked to a gun shop, purchased se=
veral different kinds of guns, using up all of the money he had, and walked=
 back to his apartment building to kill Klaine...
